name: fictioneers-node-sdk
description: Server-side javascript SDK wrapping the Fictioneers API

scripts.codegen: rm -rf src/generated-sources/openapi; openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 6.0.0; openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i https://api.fictioneers.co.uk/_docs/openapi -o src/generated-sources/openapi --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=8.10.0,typescriptThreePlus=true

author: Fictioneers
